verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>. <S%H3213>Howl<s%>, ye <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>; for it is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>, so that there is no <S%H1004>house<s%>, no entering <S%H935>in<s%>: from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3794>Kittim<s%> it is revealed to <S%H1540>them<s%>.

Be <S%H1826>still<s%>, ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H339>coast<s%>, thou whom the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>, that pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, have <S%H4390>replenished<s%>.

And on <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7883>Shihor<s%>, the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile<s%>, was her <S%H8393>revenue<s%>; and she was the <S%H5505>mart<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Be thou <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, O <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>; for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> hath <S%H559>spoken<s%>, the <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I have not <S%H2342>travailed<s%>, nor brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>, neither have I <S%H1431>nourished<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%>, nor brought <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%>.
When the <S%H8088>report<s%> cometh to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, they shall be sorely <S%H2342>pained<s%> at the <S%H8088>report<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>.
Pass ye <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>; <S%H3213>wail<s%>, ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H339>coast<s%>.

Is this your <S%H5947>joyous<s%> <S%H6927>city<s%>, whose antiquity is of <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, whose <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H2986>carried<s%> her afar <S%H7350>off<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%>?

Who hath <S%H3289>purposed<s%> this against <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, the bestower of <S%H5849>crowns<s%>, whose <S%H5503>merchants<s%> are <S%H8269>princes<s%>, whose <S%H3667>traffickers<s%> are the <S%H3513>honorable<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>?

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H3289>purposed<s%> <S%H2490>it<s%>, to stain the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of all <S%H6643>glory<s%>, to bring into <S%H7043>contempt<s%> all the <S%H3513>honorable<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Pass <S%H5674><s%> through thy <S%H776>land<s%> as the <S%H2975>Nile<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>; there is no restraint any <S%H4206>more<s%>.

He hath stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, he hath <S%H7264>shaken<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath given <S%H6680>commandment<s%> concerning <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H4581>strongholds<s%> <S%H4581>thereof<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou shalt no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5937>rejoice<s%>, O thou <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>: <S%H6965>arise<s%>, pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3794>Kittim<s%>; even there shalt thou have no <S%H5117>rest<s%>.

Behold <S%H776><s%>, the land of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: this <S%H5971>people<s%> was <S%H804>not<s%>; the Assyrian <S%H3245>founded<s%> it for them that dwell in the <S%H6728>wilderness<s%>; they set <S%H6965>up<s%> their <S%H971>towers<s%>; they <S%H6209>overthrew<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> <S%H7760>thereof<s%>; they made it a <S%H4654>ruin<s%>.
Howl <S%H3213><s%>, ye <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>; for your <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> shall be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>: after the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> it shall be unto <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> as in the <S%H7892>song<s%> of the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> a <S%H3658>harp<s%>, go <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, thou <S%H2181>harlot<s%> that hast been <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>; make <S%H3190>sweet<s%> <S%H5059>melody<s%>, sing <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7892>songs<s%>, that thou mayest be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>.

And it shall come to pass after the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, and she shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to her <S%H868>hire<s%>, and shall play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>world<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

And her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> and her <S%H868>hire<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holiness<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: it shall not be <S%H686>treasured<s%> nor laid <S%H2630>up<s%>; for her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> shall be for them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H7654>sufficiently<s%>, and for <S%H6266>durable<s%> <S%H4374>clothing<s%>.
